Datasource.Parameter: ( select geometry, osm_id, 'agriculture' as class from osm_landusages where type in ('farmland', 'farm', 'farmyard', 'orchard', 'vineyard', 'plant_nursery') union all select geometry, osm_id, 'cemetery' as class from osm_landusages where type in ('cemetery') union all select geometry, osm_id, 'glacier' as class from osm_landusages where type in ('glacier') union all select geometry, osm_id, 'grass' as class from osm_landusages where type in ('grass', 'grassland', 'meadow', 'field') union all select geometry, osm_id, 'hospital' as class from osm_landusages where type in ('hospital') union all select geometry, osm_id, 'industrial' as class from osm_landusages where type in ('industrial', 'airport') union all select geometry, osm_id, 'park' as class from osm_landusages where type in ('park', 'village_green', 'playground', 'nature_reserve', 'national_reserve', 'conservation', 'national_park') union all select geometry, osm_id, 'pitch' as class from osm_landusages where type in ('pitch', 'golf_course', 'recreation_ground', 'stadium') union all select geometry, osm_id, 'rock' as class from osm_landusages where type in ('rock', 'scree', 'quarry') union all select geometry, osm_id, 'sand' as class from osm_landusages where type in ('sand', 'beach', 'dune') union all select geometry, osm_id, 'school' as class from osm_landusages where type in ('school', 'university') union all select geometry, osm_id, 'scrub' as class from osm_landusages where type in ('scrub', 'heath', 'bush') union all select geometry, osm_id, 'wood' as class from osm_landusages where type in ('wood', 'forest') ) AS data

( select geometry, osm_id, 'wetland' as class from osm_landusages where type in ('wetland', 'marsh', 'swamp') union all select geometry, osm_id, 'wetland_noveg' as class from osm_landusages where type in ('mud', 'tidalflat') ) AS data

( select geometry, osm_id, oneway, type, 'motorway' as class from osm_roads where bridge = 0 and tunnel = 0 and type in ('motorway') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, type, 'motorway_link' as class from osm_roads where bridge = 0 and tunnel = 0 and type in ('motorway_link') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, type, 'main' as class from osm_roads where bridge = 0 and tunnel = 0 and type in ('primary', 'primary_link', 'secondary', 'secondary_link', 'tertiary', 'tertiary_link', 'trunk', 'trunk_link') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, type, 'street' as class from osm_roads where bridge = 0 and tunnel = 0 and type in ('residential', 'unclassified', 'living_street') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, type, 'street_limited' as class from osm_roads where bridge = 0 and tunnel = 0 and (type in ('pedestrian', 'construction') or access = 'private') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, type, 'service' as class from osm_roads where bridge = 0 and tunnel = 0 and type in ('service', 'track') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, type, 'driveway' as class from osm_roads where bridge = 0 and tunnel = 0 and type in ('driveway') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, type, 'path' as class from osm_roads where bridge = 0 and tunnel = 0 and type in ('path', 'cycleway', 'ski', 'steps', 'bridleway') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, type, 'major_rail' as class from osm_roads where bridge = 0 and tunnel = 0 and type in ('rail', 'monorail', 'narrow_gauge', 'subway', 'tram') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, type, 'minor_rail' as class from osm_roads where bridge = 0 and tunnel = 0 and type in ('funicular', 'light_rail', 'preserved') /* TODO aerialway, golf */ ) AS data

( select geometry, osm_id, oneway, layer, type, 'motorway' as class from osm_roads where tunnel = 1 and type in ('motorway') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, layer, type, 'motorway_link' as class from osm_roads where bridge = 1 and type in ('motorway_link') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, layer, type, 'main' as class from osm_roads where bridge = 1 and type in ('primary', 'primary_link', 'secondary', 'secondary_link', 'tertiary', 'tertiary_link', 'trunk', 'trunk_link') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, layer, type, 'street' as class from osm_roads where bridge = 1 and type in ('residential', 'unclassified', 'living_street') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, layer, type, 'street_limited' as class from osm_roads where bridge = 1 and (type in ('pedestrian', 'construction') or access = 'private') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, layer, type, 'service' as class from osm_roads where bridge = 1 and type in ('service', 'track') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, layer, type, 'driveway' as class from osm_roads where bridge = 1 and type in ('driveway') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, layer, type, 'path' as class from osm_roads where bridge = 1 and type in ('path', 'cycleway', 'ski', 'steps', 'bridleway') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, layer, type, 'major_rail' as class from osm_roads where bridge = 1 and type in ('rail', 'monorail', 'narrow_gauge', 'subway', 'tram') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, layer, type, 'minor_rail' as class from osm_roads where bridge = 1 and type in ('funicular', 'light_rail', 'preserved') /* TODO aerialway, golf */ ) AS data

( select geometry, osm_id, oneway, layer, type, 'motorway' as class from osm_roads where tunnel = 1 and type in ('motorway') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, layer, type, 'motorway_link' as class from osm_roads where tunnel = 1 and type in ('motorway_link') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, layer, type, 'main' as class from osm_roads where tunnel = 1 and type in ('primary', 'primary_link', 'secondary', 'secondary_link', 'tertiary', 'tertiary_link', 'trunk', 'trunk_link') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, layer, type, 'street' as class from osm_roads where tunnel = 1 and type in ('residential', 'unclassified', 'living_street') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, layer, type, 'street_limited' as class from osm_roads where tunnel = 1 and (type in ('pedestrian', 'construction') or access = 'private') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, layer, type, 'service' as class from osm_roads where tunnel = 1 and type in ('service', 'track') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, layer, type, 'driveway' as class from osm_roads where tunnel = 1 and type in ('driveway') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, layer, type, 'path' as class from osm_roads where tunnel = 1 and type in ('path', 'cycleway', 'ski', 'steps', 'bridleway') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, layer, type, 'major_rail' as class from osm_roads where tunnel = 1 and type in ('rail', 'monorail', 'narrow_gauge', 'subway', 'tram') union all select geometry, osm_id, oneway, layer, type, 'minor_rail' as class from osm_roads where tunnel = 1 and type in ('funicular', 'light_rail', 'preserved') /* TODO aerialway, golf */ ) AS data
( select geometry, osm_id, type, type as class from osm_waterways where z(!scale_denominator!) >= 8 ) AS data

( /* TODO get real name_en/name_de/name_es */ /* TODO improve ranking */ select geometry, osm_id, name, name as name_en, 1 as rank from osm_places where type = 'country' and population >= 250000000 union all select geometry, osm_id, name, name as name_en, 2 as rank from osm_places where type = 'country' and population >= 100000000 and population < 250000000 union all select geometry, osm_id, name, name as name_en, 3 as rank from osm_places where type = 'country' and population >= 50000000 and population < 100000000 union all select geometry, osm_id, name, name as name_en, 4 as rank from osm_places where type = 'country' and population >= 25000000 and population < 50000000 union all select geometry, osm_id, name, name as name_en, 5 as rank from osm_places where type = 'country' and population >= 10000000 and population < 25000000 union all select geometry, osm_id, name, name as name_en, 6 as rank from osm_places where type = 'country' and population < 10000000 ) AS data

( /* TODO get real name_en/name_de/name_es */ /* TODO calculate real ranks and ldir */ select geometry, osm_id, name, name as name_en, type, null as capital, 'SE' as ldir, 1 as localrank, null as scalerank from osm_places where type = 'city' union all select geometry, osm_id, name, name as name_en, type, null as capital, 'SE' as ldir, 1 as localrank, null as scalerank from osm_places where type = 'town' and z(!scale_denominator!) >= 7 union all select geometry, osm_id, name, name as name_en, type, null as capital, 'SE' as ldir, 1 as localrank, null as scalerank from osm_places where type = 'village' and z(!scale_denominator!) >= 10 union all select geometry, osm_id, name, name as name_en, type, null as capital, 'SE' as ldir, 1 as localrank, null as scalerank from osm_places where type in ('hamlet', 'suburb','neighbourhood') and z(!scale_denominator!) >= 12 ) AS data
( select ST_PointOnSurface(geometry) as geometry, osm_id, name, name as name_en, ST_Area(geometry) as area from osm_waterareas where z(!scale_denominator!) >= 8 ) AS data
( select geometry, osm_id, name, name as name_en, type, type as class from osm_waterareas where z(!scale_denominator!) >= 8 ) AS data
